PATIENT_ID: TEST_DVT_ADULT_NC_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-21 08:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-21 08:10:00
Category I trauma activation for 50-year-old male. Fall from height.
Trauma admission confirmed. Age 50.
Multiple lower extremity fractures. BP 104/68, HR 96, RR 18, GCS 15.
No active bleeding. Bleeding status: controlled.
Coagulation normal. INR 1.0. No prior anticoagulation.
No intracranial hemorrhage. No planned surgery within first 24 hours.

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-02-21 08:30:00
Admitted to surgical floor. Length of stay anticipated > 24 hours. Admitted.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-22 14:00:00
Hospital day 2. DVT prophylaxis delayed. Enoxaparin not ordered.
Chemical DVT prophylaxis not initiated in the first 36 hours.
DVT prophylaxis held without documented contraindication.
Prophylaxis delayed beyond protocol timeframe.
